member.name: T:Improbable.Entity.Component.AsyncCommandResponder`3
member.summary: Object for sending asynchronous responses to command requests. Upon receiving an incoming command request, a user-defined callback containing a user-submitted strategy for responding to the request is invoked.

member.name: T:Improbable.Entity.Component.AsyncCommandResponder`3.CommandResponseCallbackAsync
member.summary: Type definition: user defined callback function returning a command response given a command request.

member.name: M:Improbable.Entity.Component.AsyncCommandResponder`3.#ctor(Improbable.Entity.Component.AsyncCommandResponder{`0,`1,`2}.CommandResponseCallbackAsync)
member.summary: Constructor method that sets the callback field.

member.name: M:Improbable.Entity.Component.AsyncCommandResponder`3.SendResponse(Improbable.Entity.Component.ResponseHandle{`0,`1,`2})
member.summary: Respond to an incoming command request asynchronously by invoking the user-defined callback. The logic defined in the callback needs to eventually lead to an invokation of responseHandle.Respond().

member.summary: The unique identifier.

member.name: T:Improbable.Entity.Component.ComponentFactoryCallbacks
member.summary: Contains callbacks that are invoked in response to events registered by calling IComponentFactory.RegisterWithConnection().

member.name: F:Improbable.Entity.Component.ComponentFactoryCallbacks.None
member.summary: Contains an object with no callbacks specified.

member.name: F:Improbable.Entity.Component.ComponentFactoryCallbacks.OnComponentAdded
member.summary: Invoked after a component has been added.
member.remarks: Provides the EntityId the component belongs to, the metaclass of the component, and the concrete implementation of the component.

member.name: F:Improbable.Entity.Component.ComponentFactoryCallbacks.OnComponentRemoved
member.summary: Invoked after a component has been removed.
member.remarks: Provides the EntityId the component belongs to, the metaclass of the component, and the concrete implementation of the component.

member.name: F:Improbable.Entity.Component.ComponentFactoryCallbacks.OnAuthorityChanged
member.summary: Invoked after authority over the component has been granted or revoked.
member.remarks: Provides the EntityId the component belongs to, the metaclass of the component, whether or authority is granted (true) or revoked (false), and the concrete implementation of the component.

member.name: F:Improbable.Entity.Component.ComponentFactoryCallbacks.OnComponentUpdated
member.summary: Invoked after the component has been updated.
member.remarks: Provides the EntityId the component belongs to, the meta class of the component, and the concrete implementation of the component.

member.summary: Handles callbacks for events.

member.summary: Invokes callbacks with every member of a given object list.

member.summary: Invokes callbacks with a given data item.

member.name: T:Improbable.Entity.Component.CommandResponderWrapper`3
member.summary: Object holding an ICommandResponder. Exposed to the user by calling [component name].Writer.On[command name]. Defines the user facing interface for registering/deregistering synchronous/asynchronous command response strategies.

member.name: M:Improbable.Entity.Component.CommandResponderWrapper`3.RegisterResponse(Improbable.Entity.Component.CommandResponder{`0,`1,`2}.CommandResponseCallback)
member.summary: Register a user-defined synchronous callback for responding to an incoming command request. A CommandResponderWrapper can only have one ICommandResponder registered at the same time.
member.exception: If a response is already registered.

member.name: M:Improbable.Entity.Component.CommandResponderWrapper`3.RegisterAsyncResponse(Improbable.Entity.Component.AsyncCommandResponder{`0,`1,`2}.CommandResponseCallbackAsync)
member.summary: Register a user-defined asynchronous callback for responding to an incoming command request. A CommandResponderWrapper can only have one ICommandResponder registered at the same time.
member.exception: If a response is already registered.

member.name: M:Improbable.Entity.Component.CommandResponderWrapper`3.DeregisterResponse
member.summary: De-register a user-defined callback for responding to an incoming command request.

member.name: M:Improbable.Entity.Component.CommandResponderWrapper`3.InvokeSendResponse(Improbable.Entity.Component.ResponseHandle{`0,`1,`2})
member.summary: Invokes the commandResponder member fields SendResponse() method upon receiving a command request to send a response.

member.name: T:Improbable.Entity.Component.ICommandResponder`3
member.summary: Interface type for objects that respond to incoming command requests given a user-defined callback.

member.summary: Creates an instance of UserCallbackHandler.

member.name: T:Improbable.Entity.Component.ReferenceCountedMemoiser
member.summary: This class provides a stable, reference-counted memoiser. While the reference count for a particular computation is > 0, the returned results of Add and Remove will return the same object as a result. As the reference count is explicit, each call to Add must be matched with a call to Remove. Not calling Remove will cause the class to not clean up its references. Calling Remove without an Add results in an error.

member.name: T:Improbable.Entity.Component.IComponentFactory
member.summary: An interface that allows for component meta classes to receive events on a per-entity basis.

member.summary: Call this once for each associated meta class to receive callbacks. These callbacks will be called for the lifetime of the dispatcher object.

member.name: M:Improbable.Entity.Component.IComponentFactory.UnregisterWithConnection(Improbable.Worker.Connection,Improbable.Worker.Dispatcher)
member.summary: Call this once for each associated meta class when the connection is disposed of.

member.summary: This method no longer does anything and should not be used. Removes all event handlers from the instance associated with entityId.

member.name: T:Improbable.Entity.Component.CommandResponder`3
member.summary: Object for sending synchronous responses to command requests. Upon receiving an incoming command request, a response is composed with the help of a user-defined callback and sent back to the requester immediately.

member.summary: Type definition: user defined callback function returning a command response given a command request.

member.summary: Respond to an incoming command request synchronously by sending back a command response immediately.
